comments:
Reproduce:
execute the Platform.Model.FastXPath testsuite, import the websphere symptom DB, import the cbe xml file. select one event and anaysis it. I get the following error message in the .log file. 

!ENTRY org.eclipse.hyades.sdb 2 0 2007-05-17 12:20:25.390
!MESSAGE The feature 'created's type 'DateTime' does not permit a value of type 'java.lang.Short'
!STACK 0
java.lang.ClassCastException: The feature 'created's type 'DateTime' does not permit a value of type 'java.lang.Short'
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.impl.EStructuralFeatureImpl$BasicFeatureMapEntry.validate(EStructuralFeatureImpl.java:2891)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.FeatureMapUtil.createEntry(FeatureMapUtil.java:180)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.BasicFeatureMap.createEntry(BasicFeatureMap.java:101)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.BasicFeatureMap.add(BasicFeatureMap.java:1155)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.symptom.analysis.XPathCorrelationEngine.emitSymptom(XPathCorrelationEngine.java:726)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.symptom.analysis.XPathCorrelationEngine.processCBECommonBaseEvents(XPathCorrelationEngine.java:361)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.symptom.analysis.XPathCorrelationEngine.buildResults(XPathCorrelationEngine.java:244)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.symptom.analysis.XPathCorrelationEngine.correlate(XPathCorrelationEngine.java:188)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logc.internal.util.AnalysisFacade.analyzeLog(AnalysisFacade.java:121)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.sdb.internal.util.LogAnalyzerDelegator.correlate(LogAnalyzerDelegator.java:80)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.log.views.internal.actions.ExtendedAnalyzeAction$1.run(ExtendedAnalyzeAction.java:137)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
Which EMF and JVM are you using Cindy? I ran with EMF 2.2 and both JDK1.4.2 and 5 and with EMF2.3 with JDK 5 both SUN and IBM and couldn't reproduce your problem.
This should be investigated in iteration 4.

Created an attachment (id=69758)
Patch for 187606

Attaching patch.

Created an attachment (id=69775)
Updated test suite

Attached an updated test suite containing a new manual test case, SymptomCreationTime_TimeZone, that tests the proposed fix.
